content: this is a larger version of the lily of the valley doily 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lily-of-the-valley-doily **materials required ** steel crochet hook no 7 the famous puritan mercerized crochet cotton article 40 2 balls white cream or ecru for a doily approx 21 inches in diameter *or* the famous puritan star spangled mercerized crochet cotton article 40 5 balls silver spangle or color of your choice for a doily approx 25 inches in diameter
